ValidationRule.description: Validates that the MobilePhone field contains only valid phone number characters and has a minimum length
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MobilePhone)), OR( LEN(MobilePhone) < 8, LEN(MobilePhone) > 50, NOT(REGEX(MobilePhone, "^\\+[0-9\\s\\-\\(\\)\\.]+([xX]|ext|extension|;|,)?\\s*[0-9]*$")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mobile phone must start with + (country code), be 8-50 characters, and can include extensions (x123, ext 123, ;123, or ,123).
